hero.availability: Currently working on expanding my capital - Q4 2025.

sections.heading: What I do
sections.body: Product direction, design systems, and front-of-house web experiences for seed to Series B teams.

sections.heading: How I work
sections.body: Deep partnership with founders and product leads, translating fuzzy ideas into polished flows, prototypes, and production-ready UIs.

sections.heading: Now
sections.body: Partnering with Mercury on their payments dashboard while shaping the brand refresh for Atlas Index.

highlights.title: Mercury
highlights.description: Rebuilt the design system and marketing site, unlocking a 40% faster iteration cadence across product squads.

highlights.title: Northwind
highlights.description: Crafted a responsive marketing engine that lifted trial-to-paid conversions by 30% within three months.

highlights.title: Atlas Index
